snippet.title: Fire & Brimstone - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
A traditional roguelike with a randomized skilltree. Play as Jess, a lonely imp come to explore the depths of a temple lost in the guts of a volcano, in search of a powerful artifact that may let them have friends.

🏛️ Get the game now on Itch: https://punkcake.itch.io/brimstone
👹 Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com//app/3594970
💖 Get the game on Patreon: https://patreon.com/punkcake/about
🏺 Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/TkdktuKBgp
